mapper.select: SELECT (select member.nick as repo_owner from member where repo.owner=member.idx ) as repo_owner, member.nick as member_nick,repo.name as repo_name,(SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, push.date, CURDATE()) from push where push.repo = repo.idx limit 1) as push_date, (select count(star.repo)from star where star.repo=repo.idx) as star_count FROM member,repo, star WHERE member.idx = star.member and star.repo = repo.idx and member.nick=#{nick};
